thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hunan Friendship & Apollo Commercial Plans Share BuyBack

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hunan Friendship & Apollo Commercial Plans Share BuyBack

organizations.name: reuters) - hunan friendship & apollo commercial co ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Hunan Friendship & Apollo Commercial Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY BACK BETWEEN 50 MILLION YUAN ($7.94 million) AND 200 MILLION YUAN WORTH OF SHARES WITHIN 12 MONTHS AFTER SHAREHOLDERS' APPROVAL Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BTQKJp Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2966 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
